equipment.name: Initial Monster Trucks
equipment.description: Versatile **monster trucks** with balanced power, off-road capability, and handling. Perfect for various **offroad** tracks.

equipment.name: Light Offroaders
equipment.description: Fast and agile **all-terrain vehicles** ideal for speed races and exploring hard-to-reach areas.

equipment.name: Heavy Duty Trucks
equipment.description: Powerful **offroad vehicles** with immense torque but slower speeds. Excellent for overcoming the toughest obstacles.

equipment.name: Trophy Race Buggies
equipment.description: Specialized **buggies** with reinforced suspension and a lightweight design for extreme **offroad** racing.

equipment.name: Offroad Support Vehicles
equipment.description: Long-range support vehicles capable of delivering heavy cargo and equipment through the most impassable terrain.
